terminal.help: Available Commands:,[Profile],about       - About me,skills      - My technical skills,experience  - Work experience,education   - Educational background,resume      - View my resume,projects    - What I've worked on,,[Contact],contact     - Contact information,social      - Social media links,,[Fun],joke        - Programming jokes,quote       - Inspirational quotes,,[Utilities],clear       - Clear the terminal,date        - Current date and time,echo [text] - Echo text back,calc [expr]- Simple calculator,theme [name]- Change theme (light | dark | neon),uptime      - Show terminal uptime
terminal.about:
About Me,
I'm Garee, a passionate full-stack developer skilled in modern web technologies.
I love building efficient, scalable solutions and learning new technologies.
With over 3 years of experience, I've worked on various projects from small websites to complex web applications.
